summary: This document outlines the terms of reference for the Regional Reputational Risk Committee of Deutsche Bank Americas, detailing its mission, responsibilities, and governance structure. It emphasizes the importance of reputational risk management and the delegation of authority within the bank's governance framework.
keyFacts: The Committee was established on January 1, 2010.
The terms of reference are being revised by the Group Reputational Risk Committee.
The Committee's mandate includes oversight and governance of reputational risk management in the Americas Region.
The Chairperson has the authority to set up the structure and membership of the Committee.
The document is marked as confidential and is for internal use only.
